review: I have been using this since it came out and cannot get enough of it. I use it everyday for streaming YouTube videos and also live streaming games on my TV. It is relatively inexpensive compared to Roku or Apple TV and very easy to setup. Even if you are a beginner, it wouldn't take you more than 5 mins to set up. You can also cast things from multiple devices such as a PC or tablet.What I love most is that it doesn't consume battery on the smartphone so you can turn off the screen after you have initiated the streaming.It doesn't support any local storage media directly so the only way to do it is by connecting the storage media to your PC and stream from there.
